 2015-11472015-07-28,  ,  ,  PMO, 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisOrder fixing additional remuneration of DAVID P.F. LEE , full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada, at 4% of his annual salary for the period he is delegated the powers of coordinating member of the Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada, effective October 1, 2014.
